cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 10 miles WSW of Cape Hatteras, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northeast parallel to the U.S. East Coast and accelerating toward Nova Scotia
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Nova Scotia (near or south of Halifax)

weather_observation.watch_coast: North Carolina/Virginia border to Fenwick Island, DE; Chesapeake Bay from Drum Point southward; Tidal Potomac south of Cobb Island
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning area described above (Baltimore is outside)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Outer Banks of NC northward to New England coastline and Atlantic Canada
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (â‰¤3%) for sustained tropical-storm-force winds; brief gusts possible Friday afternoon.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected for the upper Chesapeake Bay including Baltimore.
weather_observation.rainfall: Only light rain bands expected; heavy rainfall core remains well offshore.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Minor slick water and higher than normal tides possible in lower bay but operational impact at Baltimore minimal.
